label.generic.title: Title
text.generic.areyousure: Are you sure you want to continue?
text.generic.editlifecycle: (To edit permissions switch to Life Cycle View)
label.role.author: Author
text.form.pwdreq: Password must be minimum of 8 characters, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and a special character.
text.login.title: Login
text.loginauth.title: Before we can sign you in, we need to verify you are the account owner. Choose to send an authentication code to your email or to your phone via SMS.
text.authcode.title: Enter the five digit code we sent to your registered {type}
text.forgotpwd.title: Enter the email address assigned to this account to receive instructions on how to reset your password
text.forgotpwd.success: Check your email for instructions to reset your password
text.forgotpwd.linkexpired: Your password reset link is no longer valid, generate a new link by clicking on Forgot Password
text.dashboard.editproperties: Here you can change all existing properties of the application.
text.newapplication.choosesource: Choose your source cloud/server to connect with.
text.newapplication.serverdetails: Enter your source cloud/server details to connect. Fields with an * are mandatory.
text.newapplication.directory: Select the submission folder which you want to upload
text.newapplication.applicationdetails: Enter the details for the selected submission. Fields with an * are mandatory.
label.usermgmt.title: User Management
text.usermgmt.deactivatemsg: This user will no longer be able to access the system until an Omnicia administrator enables their account again. Any remaining time from the assigned license can be applied to another user within 30 days.
text.usermgmt.activatemsg: This user will be now able to access the system.
text.usermgmt.accesscontrol: Select the customers and associated applications you want to permit access to.
text.usermgmt.applicationaccess: Select a customer to view and make changes to application access.
text.profile.addmsg: Complete the form below to create a profile. Fields with an * are mandatory.
text.profile.editmsg: Make edits to your user profile below
text.profile.uniqueuserpwd: Create a unique username and password.
text.user.editmsg: Make edits to this {type} profile below. Fields with an * are mandatory.
text.user.addmsg: Complete the form below to add a new {type}. Fields with an * are mandatory.
text.user.selectrolemsg: Select the role that this user will be assigned
text.user.selectdeptmsg: Select the department this user is a part of
text.user.choosesubscriptionmsg: Choose a license to apply to this user's account.
text.user.addevennolicence: You can still add this user, but they won’t be able to login and access the platform until a license has been assigned. Contact an Omnicia Admin to purchase more licenses for your account.
label.user.name: Name
label.user.areyousuremarkseccontact: Are you sure you want to tag selected users as Secondary Contacts?
label.user.areyousuredeleteuser: Are you sure you want to delete the user?
label.user.areyousuredeletesubmission: Are you sure you want to delete the Application {name}?
label.user.areyousureremoveseccontact: Are you sure you want to remove the user as the Secondary Contact?
label.user.areyousureunmarkseccontact: Are you sure you want to remove the selected users as the Secondary Contacts?
error.user.licenceassigned: {product} - This license was previously assigned to an account that is now deactivated. {remain} days of access remain. Expires in {expire} days if left unassigned.
text.customer.deactivate: The customer will no longer be able to access the system until an Omnicia administrator enables their account again.
text.customer.activate: The customer will be now able to access the system.
text.customer.edit: Make edits to this customer profile below
text.customer.amtofdatastorage: Enter the amount of data storage this customer wants:
text.customer.noofapplications: Enter the number of applications this customer wants:
text.customer.applicationstolicence: Select which applications this customer wants to license (Select all that apply) :
text.customer.nooflicencetopurchase: Enter the # of {type} licenses this customer wants to purchase (Select at least one):
text.submission.findresults: Search results will appear here. Begin by typing in the title you are looking for in the field above.
text.submission.editpermissions: You can edit the sequence, folders, and files this user can access by checking or unchecking them.
text.submission.unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to continue?
text.submission.permissionsoverride: You have modified the permissions both at sequence level and file level. But file level permissions will have precedence over sequence level, hence sequence level permisssions will be overwritten by file level permissions.
text.licence.viewallexisting: Here you can view all existing licenses and add new ones.
text.licence.viewallpurchased: Here you can view all of your purchased licenses and assign licenses to users.
text.licence.selectlicenceparams: Use the dropdowns to select the license parameters.
text.licence.areyousuretoassign: Are you sure you want to assign this license to this user?
text.licence.areyousuretoassignmultiple: Are you sure you want to assign this license to these users?
text.licence.removelicence: Are you sure you want to remove {license} from {user}?
text.licence.chooseuser: Choose who you want to assign this license to
text.licence.contactadmin: Contact an Omnicia Admin to purchase more licenses for your account
text.licence.belowarecorrect: Confirm that the details below are correct.
text.licence.request: You currently do not have a license or your license has expired. Please request a new license from your administrator.
error.licence.choosenmax: Please note that the number of users selected cannot exceed the total number of licenses available.
error.licence.maxuserselected: The selected number of users is greater than the available number of licenses. Please select any number of users that is less than or equal to the number of available licenses.
text.permissions.global: Select who you want to have global access to all applications. Global access allows full access to all applications and the files therein.
text.permissions.individual: Select who you want to permit access to the selected applications. Permissions to specific sequences, folders, and files can be fine tuned inside of OmniView.
text.permissions.filelevel: Select the users you want to permit access to the selected sequence, folder, or file.
